config.golden_days.bushy_leaves.tooltip: Gives leaves extra foliage, inspired by Better Foliage

Beta 1.8+: Modern
Hybrid: §cREQUIRES EMF
config.golden_days.cobblestone.tooltip:
Classic -> Beta 1.6: Classic
Beta 1.7 -> Release 1.13: Modern
config.golden_days.end_style.tooltip:
Release 1.0 -> 1.2.5: Early Release
Release 1.3+: Modern

§e[W.I.P]§r Custom: Changes the vibe of The End, including the sky
It is recommended to turn on Hide Sky Flashes in the accessibility settings when using this setting
config.golden_days.oak_log_tops.tooltip: Make all Overworld logs have Oak Log tops
config.golden_days.modern_xp_bar.tooltip:
Default: false
Beta 1.8+: true

Could cause issues with other mods installed
config.golden_days.use_fast_grass.toolti:
Alpha -> Beta 1.5: true
Fast Graphics Alpha -> Release 1.8: true
config.golden_days.use_shaders.tooltip:
Used for lighting, fog, and disabling chunk blending on load

Core shaders can cause issues with many mods. Disabling might increase mod compatibility
config.golden_days.use_overlay_ctm.toolt:
Some blocks will overlay their texture on adjacent blocks

§eIf you are using Golden Days Alpha, you must change this to §a§lno_tint §eor else the grass texture will not match
golden_days.presets.tooltip: A mix of presets based on actual Minecraft versions.
